# cmccloudv2_keymanagement_container (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "cmccloudv2_keymanagement_container" "key_container_1" {  
    name = "container-a2de" 
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the key management container

### Optional

- `timeouts` (Block, Optional) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--timeouts))

### Read-Only

- `container_ref` (String) The reference of the key management container
- `created_at` (String)
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
